entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI failure in the test System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DeleteOnClose.OpenOrCreate_DeleteOnClose_UsableAsMutex #60147
  • DllNotFoundException after .NET 5 in-place update #60144
  • [HTTP/3] Http3RequestStream is not properly aborted on finalization #60141
  • Code Cleanup: Remove OSX 10.14 compatibility code #60138
    Future
  • QuicConnection.AcceptStreamAsync throws incorrect exception on browser close #60133
  • BackgroundService that doesn't call base.StartAsync leads to NullReferenceException - .NET 6 breaking change #60131
    6.0.0
  • Will a .net 5 project be able to use AOT feature? #60130
  • Re-enable runtime tests running on Android arm64, when the installation timeout gets fixed #60128
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: List<T> AddRange / InsertRange Overloads #60127
  • Make ImmutableArray.CreateRange<T>(IEnumerable<T>) Thread-safe #60126
  • SignedCms: does not enable RSASSA-PSS signing #60125
    7.0.0
  • Several .NET 5 assemblies are deployed without matching PDBs in MS Symbol Server #60123
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.HostTests.HostLifetimeOnStartedDelaysStart failed on rolling build #60121
  • [HTTP/3] We don't drain H3 stream after trailing headers #60118
  • The "AppleAppBuilderTask" task failed unexpectedly - CMake Error - add_library cannot create target because another target with the same name already exists. #60115
  • Thread.Priority ignored on Linux? #60114
  • Mono: UnmanagedCallersOnly functions with ref parameters aren't considered blittable by the AOT compiler #60113
  • Output unexpected literal string in MetricsEventSource.ParseSpecs #60110
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow `Console.ReadKey` to parse VT sequences when `ENABLE_VIRTUAL_TERMINAL_INPUT` is set on Windows #60107
  • [API Proposal]: Add BlockingCollection<T>.CompleteAdding(Exception) #60106

Closed

  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.TestWindowsNlsDisplayNames is failing on rolling builds #60119
    7.0.0
  • Missing XmlSerializers.dll in nupkg [Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator] #59139
  • Question how run BenchmarkDotnet #60145
  • Awaiting the cancellation token in a BackgroundService throws an exception. #60122
  • generatelayoutonly without previously building the tests fails due to unrestored assets #60137
  • SampleProfiler incorrectly marks all samples as external code on Windows #45179
    7.0.0
  • Code optimization of Debugger.cs (CoreCLR) #59048
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.TestWindowsNlsDisplayNames failed on release coreclr windows x86 Debug #60097
    7.0.0
  • Linux/arm64: Assertion failed 'assignedInterval->isLocalVar' #60070
  • Can't authorize in asp.net server with kerberos (401) #59983
  • System.Text.Json support for DynamicObject. #31175
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding #59800
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'val->OperIs(GT_IND, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_CNS_INT)' #59871
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `mono-aot-cross` asserts with `function:mono_method_to_ir, VAR 1 (TValue_REF) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations ` #57560
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeZones Test failure #60150
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Limit FileStream DeleteOnClose test to only Unix #60149
    area-System.IO
  • Add support for cloning loops with `<=` conditions #60148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add issue reporting guidelines to CONTRIBUTING.md #60142
    area-Meta
  • Check BackgroundService.ExecuteTask for null #60139
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not strip dotnet.wasm in Debug build #60134
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Regression Fix - Update HostFactoryResolver, set the app name via an argument #60132
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Support passing total code size through when doing SPMI diffs #60124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable rundownvalidation runtime test on MonoVM #60117
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [6.0] Port "Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters (#59741)" to 6.0 #60116
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • SafeFileHandle.Unix: don't DeleteOnClose when lock is not succesful. #60112
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Override `corehost_resolve_component_dependencies` and `corehost_set_error_writer` PInvokes in singlefile scenario. #60111
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Fix issue with incorrect handling of optimized method layouts #60109
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Fix TimeZones Test failure #60140
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #59767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move more pipelines to scheduled rather than rolling #60099
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dependency of GenerateLayout on RestorePackages #60136
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Correctly Save GC Mode on Suspension on Windows for SampleProfiler #59974
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize code readability in Debugger.cs #60071
    area-System.Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix libcoreclr.so build incompatibilities on Linux #60077
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono
  • Use forms in bug report issue template #60129
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoid using Uint8Array to set memory content #60087
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/5.0] Additional RPMs for CBL-Mariner #59548
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 5.0.x
  • Make field nodes unary #60105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dead code #60095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Regression Fix - Update HostFactoryResolver, set the app name via an argument #60053
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Enable host.pkg subset in source-build #60069
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an assert condition for UpperVectorSave/Restore #60108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not check options values if options haven't been initialized in BindingDoesNotThrowIfReloadedDuringBinding test #60062
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [HTTP/3] Set EOS for 0-length response payload #60120
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove SkipOn NetFramework attributes in System.Reflection.Emit tests #60103
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Don't create a symbols archive in a PGO build. #60096
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Merge src/tests/run.proj into src/tests/build.proj #60098
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add R2RTest support for the perfmap-format-version Crossgen2 option #60002
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add PreciseRefCountsRequired method #60027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix benign assert in gtNewTempAssign #59991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix a JIT assert. #59861
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Show error dialog in single-file app when runtime is missing #60045
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.0
  • Change loop cloning conditions codegen #59886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters #59741
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [WIP] Fix gc.cpp compilation with BACKGROUND_GC disabled #59958
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #60058
    area-Single-File
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #59989
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Pick up a new build of Xunit #60044
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix typedef for non-void interp entry callbacks #59990
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.0
  • Stop running runtime tests on Android arm64, until the installation timeout gets fixed #59772
    * NO MERGE *
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60024
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Unordered floating non-equality comparison #60089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Socket: don't disconnect Socket for unknown/unsupported socket options. #59925
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Tests` #57422
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • I am trying to compile a .net core app, seeing linking errors.. #1634

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: add some support for floats/doubles/uint/long/byte/ubyte/short/ushort and GT_LE/LT/GE/GT #1637

Merged

  • Add asserts for maxBit in BDD range conversions #1633
  • NativeAOT-LLVM : merge from main (includes MethodTableOf) #1636

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Webassembly / WASM Should Be its own TargetPlatform #21858
  • Excessive CPU usage with dotnet run #21855
  • dotnet add package does not support Roslyn Analyzers? #21847

Merged

  • Rename DeploymentReleasesVersion Versions.props entry to align with Arcade naming convention (#21502) #21846

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Consider storing syntax trees with document text for opened documents #57020
  • Test plan for "semi-auto-properties" #57012
    17.1
  • Named mutex bug on .NET using Mono runtime causing compile server OOM #57002
    17.1
  • System.ArgumentException from BuildDeclarationCompilationFromInProgressAsync #57000
  • Project subsetting for OOP sync may be breaking with open source generated files #56998
    17.1
  • Open generated file didn't go live again once the file was present again #56997
    17.1

Closed

  • String duplication concatenating a StringBuilder #57006
    17.0
  • 'override' completion not working for source generated methods in Visual Studio 2022 #56702
    17.0
  • Parse tree round tripping broken on Linux #30212
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • BoundConvertedSwitchExpression - do not store Conversion in the node. #57022
    Area-Compilers
  • Exclude the traits file from codeowners #57021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing commits that weren't in the blame ignore #57019
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not translate ConnectionLostException to OperationCanceledException #57018
    Area-IDE
  • Set JsonRpc.ExceptionStrategy to ExceptionProcessing.ISerializable #57017
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57016
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • EE: ignore modules with bad metadata headers #57015
    Interactive-Debugging
  • Add a workspace experiment knob to allow us to disable recoverable text. #57014
    Area-IDE
  • Record status for "Semi-auto-properties" #57013
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • BoundForEachStatement - use BoundConversion nodes to represent conversions in the node. #57010
    Area-Compilers
  • Workaround sign check failures #57007
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked
  • Log unexpected cancellation state in RemoteCallback<T> #57005
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix named mutex workaround for .NET Mono runtime #57003
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't offer to simply to an alias if it has a different meaning #57001
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Tighten enforcement of naming convention for local functions #56680
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56999
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use document options to create a correct EOL in file header code fix #56993
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • BoundUsingLocalDeclarations/BoundUsingStatement - don't store Conversion in the node. #56954
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57008
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57009
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #56931
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge main-vs-deps into snappy #57011
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • Only pass the lsp misc files workspace for non-VS scenarios. #56989
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add more completion External Access APIs for F# and TS #56972
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Don't break if we fork a snapshot after freezing partial semantics #56890
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Remove unnecessary options #56984
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56996
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56995
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57024
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57023
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle switch expressions inside function pointer invocations. #56991
    Area-Compilers
  • Reimplement the logic for remove-unnecessary-cast. #56932
    Area-IDE
  • Navigate to PDB Source documents #56842
    Area-IDE
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • BoundCompoundAssignmentOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54472
    Area-Compilers
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • BoundAsOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #56941
    Area-Compilers
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Revert https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/56314 #56986
    Area-IDE
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop using loose typing in a strongly typed language #37368
  • Blazor Azure ADB2C Authentication popup size does not match content #37365
  • Perf regression: mapaction, single_query #37363
  • ASP.NET Core Web API complex type binding from query does not work if parameter name equals property name #37360
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Can't start debugging Blazor WebAssembly with Hot Reload disabled in VS #37357
    6.0.0
  • WebAssembly+Identity template app produces "failed to fetch" error #37355
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #37349
  • Expose Use(Func<RequestDelegate, RequestDelegate> middleware) on WebApplication #37346
  • Razor Runtime Compilation: checksum validation always fails (SHA256 vs SHA1) #37359
  • Stop Collecting CI Test Bin Logs #37343

Closed

  • Reproducible builds with Razor Class Library in .NET 6 RC1 #37182
    6.0.0
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Formatters.XmlSerializerOutputFormatter.CreateSerializer(Type type) swallows exception #37132
  • Startup regression: mapaction #37350
  • Inheriting from InputSelect with multiple attribute #37354
  • At what level does it make sense to deal with URLs that contain unicode hostnames #37337
  • swagger tofile does not generate definitions from paths in controllers in minimal app #36867
    6.0.0
  • WebApplicationBuilder.WebHost.UseWebRoot(string) does not work witih UseStaticFiles(); #36999
    6.0.0
  • [Blazor] Bundling all resources into a single file #37310
  • Startup regression: fortunes, json #37276
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #37334
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #37333
  • Exception when calling RequestDelegateFactory with a route handler that returns a struct IResult #37342
    6.0.0
  • DotNet 6 Preview 4: CS8785: Generator 'RazorSourceGenerator' failed to generate source #33092
    Backlog
  • HttpResponse.OnCompleted does not fire always fire for HTTP/1.1 #37024

PullRequests

Created

  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362

Merged

  • Add WebApi-CSharp Template Toggle Description #37367
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Support struct IResults #37347
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.0
  • Support struct IResults #37344
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Binary Logs for Test Jobs #37339
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21480.20 #37192
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Try out helix retry #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • Health checks can use dependencies that implement IAsyncDisposable only #37297
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Honoring error information on OAuth Exchange Code #37224
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Update build.gradle #36477
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 3.1.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Empty .Net Trace File generated #2654

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] [Android] CollectionView inside a VerticalStackLayout inside a Shell doesn't render any items #2865
  • [Bug] While measuring, grid children does not return the desired size. #2863
  • Porting Blazor WASM to Blazor MAUI #2861

Closed

  • [Bug] VS project templates indistinguishable from Legacy templates #2449
  • [Bug] Let MAUI page inherit form custom base class #2864

PullRequests

Created

  • Apply layout updates to ShellPageContainer child pages #2876
  • WinUI Toolbar Handler #2875
  • [Essentials] Cleanup docs on pick file #2874
  • [Essentials] Implement the new ConnectivityManager.NetworkCallback for N+ #2873
  • [Essentials] Fix orientation rotation delay on Android #2872
  • [Essentials] Update LocationExtensions.ios.tvos.watchos.macos.cs #2871
  • [Essentials] Set the PopoverPresentationController for files too #2870
  • Add code to use `@(MauiIcon)` instead of `@(MauiImage)` with several properties #2869
  • Add `ITextButton` and related Mappers #2868
  • Move IDispatcher logic out of IPlatformServices #2862

Merged

  • [Windows] Add SelectionLength mapping to entry handler #2757
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Add IndicatorView handler #2760
    area/desktop 🖥️

Updated

  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #2841
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Use the new Win2D and WinUI packages #2846
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support to exclude tables during scaffolding #26277
  • You can avoid scaffolding the connection string by using the Name= syntax to read it from configuration #26273
  • Temporal history table name always based on entity type name, not table name #26271
    6.0.0

Closed

  • The framework 'Microsoft.NETCore.App', version '2.0.0' was not found. #26275
  • FirstOrDefaultAsync() indicates return value is not ever null #26272
    6.0.0
  • [EFCore 6.0] [Firebird] Problem with test NorthwindMiscellaneousQueryTestBase.Entity_equality_on_subquery_with_null_check #25954
    MQ
  • Migrations executed individually pass, executing all migrations fails #26234

PullRequests

Merged

  • [SMALL] Fix to #25954 - [EFCore 6.0] [Firebird] Problem with test NorthwindMiscellaneousQueryTestBase.Entity_equality_on_subquery_with_null_check #26269
  • More GroupBy tests #26105

Updated

  • fix : ensuring annotation white space. #26262
    blocked

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-07
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Generate Mariner RPM for 5.0.4xx #12109

  • Generate Mariner RPM for 3.1.4xx #12110

  • Add runtime patch to enable host.pkg subset to eliminate prebuilts #12256
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use WIX_NATIVE_MACHINE to detect native architecture of target machine #12259
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [ArPow] Re-enable source-build tarball PR validation #12245
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add some additional distros to the CI matrix #12141
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #12236
